\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\[
w_{ij}(t+1)=w_{ij}(t)+(2DVC_{i}(t)-1)\cdot(2DVC_{j}(t)-1)
\]

\[
f(x)=\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}
\]

\[
DVC_{i}(t+1)=f\{DVC_{i}(T)+\sum_{j}w_{ij}(t+1)\cdot DVC_{j}(t)\}
\]

\end{document}
